projects.title: Resume Parser
projects.short_description: A simple project to parse resumes and extract information.
projects.description: A fun learning project to parse resumes and extract information and make it downloadable in excel format. Made using Flask.

projects.title: Food Delivery Service App
projects.short_description: A simple web app for food delivery service.
projects.description: A web app with customer, restaurant, delivery agent and admin interfaces. Made using MERN stack.

projects.title: MyKhata App
projects.short_description: A simple web app to keep track of your day to day expenses.
projects.description: Made in React, using MongoDB and Azure SQL databases and Express.js for backend. This project is still a work in development.

projects.title: NSSC Website
projects.short_description: Contributed to website for Space Fest, National Students' Space Challenge held at IIT Kharagpur.
projects.description: Contributed in making frontend for the website of National Students' Space Challenge held at IIT Kharagpur.

projects.title: spAts Website
projects.short_description: Contributed to website for Space Technology Students' Society, IIT Kharagpur.
projects.description: Contributed to make a React based website for Space Technology Students' Society, IIT Kharagpur.

projects.title: TicTacToe
projects.short_description: My first project in React. A simple TicTacToe game :)
projects.description: A simple TicTacToe game made using React. It was my first project in React and I learned a lot from it.

projects.title: GenWraps
projects.short_description: A simple method to wrap your python generators for replenishable iterators.
projects.description: This module provides simple classes to wrap your python generator code and produce multiple same state iterators. Used to avoid multiple generator calls.
